description:
Contents:

- Two Character Edit Vouchers (Batch 2)

Character Edit Vouchers give you a chance to change your character's appearance any way you like!

- Use a voucher at the save data select screen to edit the appearance of an existing hunter.
- This add-on content can only be obtained once.
- Each voucher is consumed upon saving the edited character.
- You can edit hair, eyebrow colour, facial hair, makeup and clothing from the Item Box without using a voucher.
name: Two Character Edit Vouchers (Batch 2)
